title: Sri Lankan President to address Oxford Union tomorrow; The only Head of State to address the Oxford Union second time
content: Sri Lankan President Rajapaksa who is in London now is due to address the Oxford Union for a second time Thursday. Sri Lanka’s renowned politicians and statesmen such as former Prime Minister S.W.R.D. Bandaranaike, former President Chandrika Bandaranaike Kumaratunga, former Foreign Minister Lakshman Kadirgamar, late Minister Lalith Athulathmudali and President Mahinda Rajapaksa, have previously addressed…
